column4: brownie: it may or may not work and it is advised to assume it won't work
brownie: get the source and compile it

compiling may be fine and dandy, but go keep track of the things you compile and place in the system. what happens when you want to remove them? what happens if they required dependencies and you just found yourself with a buncha libs you dont need anymore?
that ... or compile, then create a deb :)
